structure.unit: ARTICLE XLII. TRANSPORTATION, INFRASTRUCTURE AND CONCURRENCY TASK FORCE

law.catch_line: Transportation, Infrastructure and Concurrency Task Force created; purpose.

text.section:
Sec. 2-395. Transportation, Infrastructure and Concurrency Task Force created; purpose.
There is hereby created and established the Miami-Dade County Transportation, Infrastructure and Concurrency Task Force, the purpose of which shall be advise the Board of County Commissioners on all matters pertaining to transportation facilities and services, as well as other public facilities and services, necessary for sound and orderly land development and infilling, with particular emphasis on matters pertaining to the formulation and coordination of public and private efforts to provide transportation facilities and services, that will best enhance the quality of life for the County's present and future residents and visitors.
